classes.name: notifications-queue
classes.description: Base class for the notifications queue

classes.name: notifications-queue__backdrop
classes.description: Class to apply backdrop to notifications queue in mobile port

classes.name: notifications-queue__content
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue content

classes.name: notifications-queue__content--scroll
classes.description: Class to enable scrolling for notifications queue content

classes.name: notifications-queue__view-all
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue's view all panel

classes.name: notifications-queue__view-all-button
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue's view all button

classes.name: notification-queue__header
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue header

classes.name: notifications-queue__header--grouped
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue grouped header

classes.name: notifications-queue__title
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue title

classes.name: notifications-queue__clear-text
classes.description: Class to apply styles to clear text

classes.name: notifications-queue__close-icon
classes.description: Class to apply styles to notifications queue close icon

classes.name: notifications-queue__panel
classes.description: Container for the set of system notifications

classes.name: notification-queue__panel--multiple
classes.description: to apply styles to panel contains multiple items

classes.name: notification-queue__group-header
classes.description: Class to apply styles to the group header

classes.name: notification-queue__group-header--first
classes.description: to apply styles to the first group header

classes.name: notification-queue__group-title
classes.description: Class to apply styles to group title

classes.name: notification-queue__group-title--first
classes.description: Class to apply styles to first group title

classes.name: notification-queue__group-clear-text
classes.description: Class to apply styles to group clear text

classes.name: notification-queue__group-clear-text--first
classes.description: Class to apply styles to first group clear text

classes.name: notifications-queue--dark
classes.description: Class to apply dark theme to notifications queue

description: This is the sass version of notifications queue. It is a container for system notifications.
name: Notifications Queue
